verbose_text: Senescence can also be activated by transcriptional induction of p16 / Ink4a, which is a major tumor suppressor protein that responds to many forms of stress and whose expression increases by several orders of magnitude in human and mouse tissues with age, even though inbred mouse tissues have long telomeres and their somatic cells are positive for telomerase.
evidence: Senescence can also be activated by transcriptional induction of p16
